input: current date: today, forecast date: 2023-11-27, temperature: 20°C, day: Monday
output:
Hey sunny Monday! 🌞 As we look ahead to our forecast on the shiny Tuesday of November 27th, things are shaping up to be just as delightful where it's at. Our mercury is expected to keep creeping its way comfortably into a cozy 20°C by midday, which means no need for those chilly wraps or scarves – you can leave all your winter gear hibernating in the closet. 😊 The sky is destined to remain a bright and sunny canvas with an occasional high-flying birdie or two taking flight through the crisp clear air. So bundle up in your comfy jeans, throw on that new top from the sale section, and go out and soak in this mild weather; it's more of a warm and welcoming 20° than anything chilly. 🌄

And you know what they say, "When life gives you lemons, don't just grab them – use them to make lemonade on this perfect day!" So if you're feeling particularly festive, perhaps consider baking that batch of delightful lemon bars or maybe even whip up a pitcher of refreshing lemonade. Your Monday will be one for the books! 🍦柠檬黄油挞 & ♨️冷饮小窍门

I've got to give these forecasters props though; they seem to have gotten this exact day spot on, and we're lucky enough that it's likely to stay this warm all week long. So no need to worry about turning up the heating tonight or any time soon… just keep enjoying these balmy temperatures as they unfold in front of us! 🎉
